languages.text: Блюстительница грубо и хрипло смеется, а затем плюет вам в лицо: раскрывать рот обычному поломойке не положено по уставу, а уж мнить себя Вольным Торговцем — тем более. За такое можно и языка лишиться. Свои слова женщина подкрепляет демонстрацией увесистого ножа и зашвыривает вас в угол к таким же оборванцам, драющим, судя по табличке на стене, отсек Тета-54 — нижние палубы.

traits.locale_text: Стражница грубо и хрипло смеется, а затем плюет вам в лицо: раскрывать рот обычному поломойке не положено по уставу, а уж мнить себя Вольным Торговцем — тем более. За такое можно и языка лишиться. Свои слова женщина подкрепляет демонстрацией увесистого ножа и зашвыривает вас в угол к таким же оборванцам, драющим, судя по табличке на стене, отсек Тета-54 — нижние палубы.

languages.text: The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.
languages.original_text: Блюстительница грубо и хрипло смеется, а затем плюет вам в лицо: раскрывать рот обычному поломойке не положено по уставу, а уж мнить себя Вольным Торговцем — тем более. За такое можно и языка лишиться. Свои слова женщина подкрепляет демонстрацией увесистого ножа и зашвыривает вас в угол к таким же оборванцам, драющим, судя по табличке на стене, отсек Тета-54 — нижние палубы.

traits.locale_text: The guard laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then spits in your face: it's way above a scrub{mf|man|woman}'s station to open {mf|his|her} mouth at all, let alone to fancy {mf|him|her}self the Rogue Trader. It's the kind of thing you can lose your tongue for. To drive home her point, the woman produces a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where ragged people like yourself are scrubbing what a sign on the wall says is Chamber Theta 54. The lower decks.

The guard laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then spits in your face: it's way above a scrub{mf|man|woman}'s station to open {mf|his|her} mouth at all, let alone to fancy {mf|him|her}self the Rogue Trader. It's the kind of thing you can lose your tongue for. To drive home her point, the woman produces a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where ragged people like yourself are scrubbing what a sign on the wall says is Chamber Theta 54. The lower decks.

The guard laughs gruffly and hoarsely, then spits in your face: it's way above a scrub{mf|man|woman}'s station to open {mf|his|her} mouth at all, let alone to fancy {mf|him|her}self the Rogue Trader. It's the kind of thing you can lose your tongue for. To drive home her point, the woman produces a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where ragged people like yourself are scrubbing what a sign indicates as Chamber Theta 54. The lower decks.

The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in the Rogue Trader's face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses the Rogue Trader into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in the Rogue Trader's face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses the Rogue Trader into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

languages.text: 那个执法者发出了一阵粗野的笑声，之后朝你脸上吐了口口水。像这种擦洗甲板的苦工，光是开口说话就已经是非常出格的行为了，更不用提自称行商浪人。哪怕不是这么严重的冒犯行为，也足以让这些苦工被割掉舌头。为了让所有人明白她的观点，这个女人挥舞着一把钝厚的刀子，将你丢到了角落里，那里也有同样穿着褴褛衣衫的人在清洗甲板。舱壁上的标志显示，这里是下层甲板的西塔54区。
languages.original_text: The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

traits.locale_text: 那个执法者发出了一阵粗野的笑声，之后朝你脸上吐了口口水。像这种擦洗甲板的苦工，光是开口说话就已经是非常出格的行为了，更不用提自称行商浪人。哪怕不是这么严重的冒犯行为，也足以让这些苦工被割掉舌头。为了让所有人明白她的观点，这个女人挥舞着一把钝厚的刀子，将你丢到了角落里，那里也有同样穿着褴褛衣衫的人在清洗甲板。舱壁上的标志显示，这里是下层甲板的西塔54区。

languages.text: La guardia suelta una risa ronca y te escupe en la cara: que un{mf||a} limpiador{mf||a} abra la boca ya es intolerable, no digamos ya fingir ser {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. La escoria pierde la lengua por menos. Para ilustrar su argumento, la mujer desenvaina un cuchillo de gran tamaño antes de tirarte a una esquina donde otras personas harapientas están fregando la cubierta. Según la señal de la mampara, esta es la bahía Theta 54.
languages.original_text: The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

traits.locale_text: La guardia suelta una risa ronca y escupe en la cara de{mf|l| la} Comerciante: que un{mf||a} limpiador{mf||a} abra la boca ya es intolerable, no digamos ya fingir ser {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. La escoria pierde la lengua por menos. Para ilustrar su argumento, la mujer desenvaina un cuchillo de gran tamaño antes de tirar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante a una esquina donde otras personas harapientas están fregando la cubierta. Según la señal de la mampara, esta es la bahía Theta 54.

languages.text: 執行官は不敵な笑いを浮かべると、あなたの顔に唾を吐きかける。清掃人が{mf|man|woman}口を開く{mf|his|her}こと自体がお門違いだ。ましてローグトレーダーを名乗るとは。これで舌を失う労働者もいるのだ。女は自分の主張を通すために重いナイフを振りかざし、同じようなボロボロの人々が甲板を磨いている隅にあなたを放り込んだ。隔壁の看板によれば、ここはベイ・シータ54だ。
languages.original_text: The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

traits.locale_text: 執行官は不敵な笑いを浮かべると、ローグトレーダーの顔に唾を吐きかける。清掃人が口を開くこと自体がお門違いだ。ましてローグトレーダーを名乗るとは。これで舌を失う労働者もいるのだ。女は自分の主張を通すために重いナイフを振りかざし、同じようなボロボロの人々が甲板を磨いている隅にローグトレーダーを放り込んだ。隔壁の看板によれば、ここはベイ・シータ54だ。

languages.text: Die Enforcerin lacht grob auf und spuckt dir ins Gesicht: dass {mf|ein Schrubber|eine Schrubberin} überhaupt etwas sagt, ist schon unerhört, und dann will {mf|er|sie} auch noch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sein. Sklaven haben schon für weniger die Zunge verloren. Um ihren Standpunkt zu unterstreichen, zückt die Frau ein gewaltiges Messer und wirft dich in eine Ecke, in der einige ähnlich zerlumpte Leute bereits das Deck schrubben. Laut dem Schild auf dem Schott ist das hier Modul Theta 54.
languages.original_text: The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

traits.locale_text: Die Enforcerin lacht grob auf und spuckt dir ins Gesicht: dass {mf|ein Schrubber|eine Schrubberin} überhaupt etwas sagt, ist schon unerhört, und dann will {mf|er|sie} auch noch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sein. Sklaven haben schon für weniger die Zunge verloren. Um ihren Standpunkt zu unterstreichen, zückt die Frau ein gewaltiges Messer und wirft dich in eine Ecke, in der einige ähnlich zerlumpte Leute bereits das Deck schrubben. Laut dem Schild auf dem Schott ist das hier Modul Theta 54.

Die Enforcerin lacht grob auf und spickt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ins Gesicht: dass {mf|ein Schrubber überhaupt sein|eine Schrubberin überhaupt ihr} Maul aufmacht, ist schon unvorstellbar, aber dann auch noch zu behaupten, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu sein! Da haben Sklaven schon für weniger die Zunge verloren. Um ihren Standpunkt noch zu unterstreichen, zückt die Frau ein gewaltiges Messer und wirft {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dann in eine Ecke, in der einige ähnlich zerlumpte Leute schon dabei sind, das Deck zu schrubben. Dem Schild auf dem Schott nach zu urteilen, ist das hier Modul Theta 54.

languages.text: L'exécutante éclate d'un rire bourru, avant de vous cracher au visage : voir {mf|un homme|une femme} de cet acabit ouvrir la bouche est inacceptable, d'autant plus si c'est pour prétendre être {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Des esclaves sont morts pour moins que ça. Pour souligner son propos, la femme brandit un couteau de belle taille avant de vous pousser dans un coin où d'autres personnes vêtues des mêmes guenilles récurent le pont. D'après ce qui est inscrit sur la cloison, il s'agit de la baie Thêta 54.
languages.original_text: The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.

Des esclaves sont morts pour moins que ça. Pour souligner son propos, la femme brandit un couteau de belle taille avant de vous pousser dans un coin où d'autres personnes vêtues des mêmes guenilles récurent le pont. D'après ce qui est inscrit sur la cloison, il s'agit de la baie Thêta 54.

languages.text: İnfazcı, gürültülü bir kahkaha atıp ardından suratına tükürüyor. Bir temizlikçinin ağzını açması bile kabul edilemezken Hür Tacir olduğunu iddia etmesi ne demek oluyormuş? Normalde angaryacılar, bundan daha azını yaptıkları için dillerini kaybeder. Kadın, sağlam bir bıçak çekerek duruşunu pekiştiriyor ve seni güvertedeki aynı giyimli, yerleri temizleyen insanların yanına fırlatıyor. Bölme panelindeki yazıya göre burası Thita 54 Bölmesi.
languages.original_text: The enforcer barks out a gruff laugh, then spits in your face: a scrub{mf|man|woman} even opening {mf|his|her} mouth is beyond the pale, let alone claiming to be the Rogue Trader. Drudges have lost their tongues for less. To drive home her point, the woman brandishes a hefty knife, then tosses you into a corner where similarly ragged people are scrubbing the deck — according to the sign on the bulkhead, this is Bay Theta 54.
